title: New Light
lyrics:
[intro - kazoo]  (Am)  (D)  (G)  (C) | (Am)  (D)  (G)  (G-stop)
 
(Am) I'm the boy in your (D)other phone
(G) Lighting up inside your (C)drawer at home, all alone
(Am) Pushing 40 in the (D)friend zone
(G) We talk and then you (C)walk away, every day
(Am)Oh, you don't think (D)twice 'bout me
(G) And maybe you're (Em)right to doubt me, but
 
[chorus]
(Am) But if you (D)give me just one night
(G) You're gonna (C)see me in a new light
(Am) Yeah, if you (D)give me just one night
(G) To meet you (C)underneath the moonlight
(Am)Oh, I want a take (D)two, I want to break(G)through
I wanna know the (C)real thing about you
(Am) So I can (D)see you in a new light (G) (G-stop)
 
(Am) Take a ride up to (D)Malibu
(G) I just wanna sit and (C)look at you, look at you
(Am) What would it matter if your (D)friends knew?
(G) Who cares what other (C)people say, anyway
(Am)Oh, we can go (D)far from here
(G) And make a new (Em)world together, babe
 
[chorus]
(Am) But if you (D)give me just one night
(G) You're gonna (C)see me in a new light
(Am) Yeah, if you (D)give me just one night
(G) To meet you (C)underneath the moonlight
(Am)Oh, I want a take (D)two, I want to break(G)through
I wanna know the (C)real thing about you
(Am) So I can (D)see you in a new light (G) (G-stop)
 
[instrumental]  (Am)  (D)  (G)  (C) | (Am)  (D)  (G)  (G) Ah ah ah ah ahhhâ€¦
 
[outro - repeat x4]
(Am) What do I do with all this
(D) What do I do with all this
(G)Love that's runnin' through my veins
(C) For you?  
 
(Am - single strum) [end]
